mapper.select: select info.tkId,ticket.* from order_ticket_info info,order_ticket ticket where info.id=ticket.ticketInfo_id and ticket.trade_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and agent_id=#{agentId} limit #{page} ,#{size}
select info.tkId,ticket.* from order_ticket ticket ,order_ticket_info info where info.id=ticket.ticketInfo_id and info.tkId=#{tkId}
select count(*) from order_ticket where agent_id=#{agentid} and trade_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) from order_ticket where trade_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and agent_id=#{agentId}

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts, i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment, i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount, t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state,t.winMoney,t.recycleState, i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid, i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum, i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount, t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state,t.winMoney,t.recycleState, i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_his t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_his i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by order_id desc

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_cancel t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_cancel i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by t.order_id desc

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_cancel t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_cancel i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_his t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_his i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by order_id desc

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all
select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_cancel t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_cancel i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all
select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_his t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_his i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by order_id desc

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
union all select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_his t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_his i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by order_id desc

select t.ticketInfo_id,t.order_id,t.agent_id,i.uid,i.bettingproducts,i.inplay,i.totalinvestment/i.unitinvestment as investmentNum,i.totalInvestment,i.total_price,i.bonus-100 as addAwardAmount,t.trade_time,t.trade_price,t.trade_type,t.state ,t.winMoney,t.recycleState,i.ballType,t.recyclePrice,i.tkId,i.id from order_ticket_cancel t LEFT JOIN order_ticket_info_cancel i on i.id=t.ticketInfo_id
order by t.order_id desc
